mapper.select: SELECT did, weibo_order_did, order_no, media_name, qqnumber, comment, status_, last_update_time, last_update_by FROM advertorial.weibo_order_detail_t where 1=1 and did=#{did} limit #{start},#{limit};

delete.if: delete from advertorial.weibo_order_detail_t where did in #{model}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO advertorial.weibo_order_detail_t ( weibo_order_did, order_no, media_name, qqnumber, comment, status_, last_update_time, last_update_by) values ( #{weibo_order_did}, #{order_no}, #{media_name}, #{qqnumber}, #{comment}, #{status_}, now(), #{last_update_by})
